2025-06-14T07:09:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to strong wind condition, the following temporary traffic arrangements are now in force:

Stonecutters Bridge:
Due to strong wind, the following temporary traffic arrangements are implemented on Stonecutters Bridge:
The middle lanes of Stonecutters Bridge are closed. Only fast and slow lanes are opened to traffic. Speed limit is reduced to 50km/h.   Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-06-14T07:09:00.CONTENT_CN:
由於強風關係，下列的臨時交通措施現已生效：

昂船洲大橋：
由於強風關係，昂船洲大橋已實施下列臨時交通措施：
昂船洲大橋的中線封閉，只餘快線及慢線開放予車輛行駛，車速限制降至每小時50公里。  市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-06-15T20:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Stonecutters Bridge: The Middle lane closure and temporary speed limit arrangements which were implemented before in the Stonecutters Bridge are cancelled. Members of the public are advised to watch out for the latest traffic news through radio and television broadcasts, and for the traffic signs on site.
2025-06-15T20:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 昂船洲大橋： 較早前於昂船洲大橋實施的中線封閉及臨時車速限制措施現已取消。 市民請留意電台/電視廣播的最新交通消息，以及現場的交通標誌。

2025-06-17T07:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-06-17T07:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-06-17T16:17:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland's Railway Authorities, the following adjustments will be made to train services:

- From July 1, 2025, to facilitate improvement work in Mainland Section, train service to and from Qingsheng will be temporarily adjusted to one northbound and one southbound train per day. 

- Temporary Suspension of Advance Ticket Sales of the trains listed below for July 1 and onwards:
To/From Shanghai Hongqiao: G100, G99
To/From Xianbei: G826/7, G828/5
To Tianjinxi: G306
To Zhanjiangxi: G6048/5
To Shantou: G6578/5
Departing from Zhangjiajiexi: G6079

- In addition, the schedules of some train services will be adjusted starting July 1. 

- For information, please visit the official 12306 website (12306. cn) or mobile app, High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
2025-06-17T16:17:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路部門通報，列車服務將作出以下調整： 

- 由2025年7月1日起，來往慶盛的列車服務因配合內地段工程需要，將暫時提供每日北行及南行各一班列車服務。

- 下列車次於7月1日及以後的車票預售將暫時延後：
來往上海虹橋：G100,G99
來往西安北：G826/7,G828/5
前往天津西：G306
前往湛江西：G6048/5
前往汕頭：G6578/5
由張家界西出發：G6079

- 此外，部份列車班次將於7月1日起調整時間。

- 有關資料請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或使用手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。

2025-06-18T09:05:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Lei Yue Mun Road and Cha Kwo Ling Road, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junctions, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing junctions with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-06-18T09:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於鯉魚門道和茶果嶺道交界路口的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的路口橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-06-18T09:50:00.CONTENT_EN: The traffic lights at the junction of Lei Yue Mun Road and Cha Kwo Ling Road have resumed normal services.
2025-06-18T09:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於鯉魚門道和茶果嶺道交界路口的交通燈已恢復正常運作。
